Bahrain discovers largest oil field in country since 1932 | Charlotte Observer

Bahrain discovers largest oil field in country since 1932 The Associated Press April 01 2018 04 25 PM DUBAI United Arab Emirates The Persian Gulf island nation of Bahrain says it has discovered its largest oil field since the country s first oil well began operation nearly 90 years ago. The government said Sunday that the new resource is understood to dwarf Bahrain s current reserves. Details about the initial findings of size and extraction viability are to be released by the Oil Ministry at a news conference Wednesday. Bahrain says the tight oil and deep natural gas field was discovered off the west coast of the island in the Khaleej Al Bahrain Basin. Never miss a local story.
